para.text: The Commission shall file quarterly reports with the Council that provide a summary of activities during the prior quarter.
The Commission shall file an annual report with the Council before March 31 of each year that includes:
A summary and copy of all recommendations for reforms to criminal statutes developed by the Commission during the previous calendar year;
A summary and copy of comments received from the Advisory Group during the previous calendar year and their disposition;
A summary of other Commission activities during the previous calendar year;
A description of any problems discovered with prior Commission work or changes to prior work that are necessary due to legislative changes or court rulings;
A description of any issues that could delay or prevent the Commission from timely fulfilling its statutory duties; and
A work plan and schedule, or revisions to an existing work plan and schedule, for carrying out the responsibilities of the Commission to meet statutory requirements.

annotations.annotation: Section 3127 of D.C. Law 21-160 provided that this section shall expire on October 1, 2018.
